name: ListPublishedJobPostings
description:
Retrieve all published and publicly listed job postings.

Use this tool to get a list of job postings that are published and set for public display. Ensure to set the `listedOnly` parameter to `true` to avoid exposing unlisted jobs.

parameters.name: job_posting_filters
parameters.description: A JSON object to filter job postings by `location`, `department`, `listedOnly`, and `jobBoardId`. Use `listedOnly` as true to exclude unlisted jobs.

listedOnly.description: If true, filter out unlisted job postings.
